peopleInfo.quote: We are looking for bright and dynamic people interested in advanced solutions for Earth Sciences, since work is something that we are never short of. So no matter where in the world you might be, please send us an email with information (info at this domain) about you, and what's your definition of the future.

Pedro Pereira Goncalves Senior Analyst pedro.goncalves
Founder, CTO Earth Observation Web Services API Standards editor Business Strategy
Pedro Pereira Goncalves is an Environmental Engineer with a PhD in Environmental Systems Analysis from the Faculdade de Ciencias e Tecnologia (Universidade Nova de Lisboa) and was a post-doctoral fellow at the European Space Agency. His main interests lie in the environmental systems simulation, remote sensing and open source geospatial tools. He is one of the founders of Terradue Srl.
